body.name: Dash Camera for Cars, Dash Cam 1080P Full HD with 32GB SD Card, 2.45 inch IPS Screen, Night Vision, WDR, Accident Lock, 2 Mounting Ways, Loop Recording, Parking Monitor (Black - CAM0804)
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🚕 Full HD Recording with USB Port: This car dash cam with USB port allows for easy charging of your other mobile electronic devices. With 1080P Full HD recording and f1.8 aperture combined with WDR technology, you can playback every clear detail on your dash cam or PC.

🚕 Super Night Vision: The WDR function of this dash cam front camera automatically adjusts the brightness of the light, improving low light visibility. The camera clearly captures road conditions at night, ensuring your safety on the road.

🚕 170° Wide-Angle View: The front dash cam comes with a 170° wide field of vision, reducing blind spots and capturing more details on the road. With four lens switching options, this camera is perfect for ensuring your safety while driving.

🚕 Loop Recording and Emergency Accident Locks: The seamless loop recording overwrites old footage with new content when the card is full. The variable sensitivity G-Sensor automatically detects sudden collisions and saves the relevant footage to an SOS file, protecting your video evidence. (Note: the 32G SD card and The SD card READER are included in the package)

🚕 Easy Installation and Cost-effective: This car dashboard cam is easy to install with a suction cup and is designed to be user-friendly. With complete basic functions, this dash cam provides necessary accessories including the 32G microSD card. The system has all functions set by default, making it easy for novices to set up and use from day one. Provide technical support and replacements at any time. (Warranty: 1 year)
body.description: 🚕Dash Cam is the Advanced 1080P dash camera with Super Night Vision, Loop Recording, G-SensorModel: 【Dash Cam with 32G SD Card】Color ：【Black】Product features of car dash cam:✰The 1080P Car Dash Cam, which makes key details like road signs and vehicle number plates highly legible in all weather conditions.✰The cameras simultaneously capture the road 170° in crystal detail ensures every angle is covered and nothing is missed. ✰Equipped with a large F1.8 aperture lens and superior HDR, it automatically adjusts the exposure of the dashboard to provide extremely sharp images even at night.✰Variable sensitivity G-sensor: automatically detects collisions when and emergency locks the video in a file to prevent it from being overwritten.✰This parking mode is operated by the internal battery of the dashboard. The internal battery of the camera can last about 5 minutes when fully charged.👍Specification:Screen Display: 2.4 inch LCD ScreenLens: 170°Wide AngleVideo Resolution: 1080PVideo Format: MP4 Picture Format JPGVideo Coding: H.265Video Mode: Loop RecordingLoop Recording: Built-in

reviews.reviewText: Had it for a month and it just completely stopped working. Very disappointing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and light
reviews.reviewText: The camera is compact and does not occupy much space in the car. Liked the compact design and easy to install. It has a wide angle of view and I like the quality of the recording. Good product at the price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The camera itnis exactly what I was looking for.Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very poor quality video. Like it was recorded from a childhood memory. Good if you were making an indie short and wanted a very styled look, bad if you just want a dashcam that records clearly.
